title: General
stimulusHtml:
1 point maximum

Possible answers are:

  • To hit Dido with his arrow/To fill Dido with passion/The make Dido fall in love with Aeneas/To cast a love spell

  • To protect Aeneas/To help Aeneas (or Trojans)

  • To make Dido and the Carthaginians hospitable to Aeneas and the Trojans

    Answer must come from Book 1.
descriptions:
Student response earns none of the available points.
